sentences.en: Amniocentesis is the standard prenatal detection procedure for aneuploidy.
sentences.cn: 羊膜穿刺术是出生前检测非整倍体的金标准.

sentences.en: Around 98 percent of urban women and 70 percent of rural women have prenatal examinations.
sentences.cn: 目前,城市98%和农村70%的孕产妇都能得到产前检查.

sentences.en: Background Prenatal stress ( PNS ) can cause effects on both mother and fetal.
sentences.cn: 产前应激 ( prenatalstress,PNS) 对母体和胎儿均会造成影响.

sentences.en: First the status of prenatal heredity and postnatal development.
sentences.cn: 一,先天遗传及后天生长发育的情况.

sentences.en: I'd met her briefly in a prenatal class.
sentences.cn: 我曾经在一次产前辅导课上和她有过一面之缘。

sentences.en: In mice however AyAy is supposed to be lethal ( prenatal ).
sentences.cn: 就我所知,这种基因颜色不存在于边境犬中.

sentences.en: Like many embryonic cells, myoblosts from prenatal rats or chicks are easy to culture.
sentences.cn: 正如许多胚胎细胞一样, 胚胎大鼠或鸡的成肌细胞是易于培养的.

sentences.en: Non - invasive prenatal diagnosis of aneuploidies: how close to reality?
sentences.cn: 非整倍体异常的 非 入侵性产前诊断: 离现实有多近?

sentences.en: Objective: To prenatal diagnosis of fetal gastrointestinal tract anomalies.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨胎儿消化道畸形产前诊断的临床价值.

sentences.en: Pregnant women should undergo prenatal evaluation for evidence of varicella immunity.
sentences.cn: 孕妇应接受产前评估寻求水痘免疫证据.

sentences.en: Prenatal and post - natal nutrition, adequate rest to build up resistance.
sentences.cn: 产前产后加强营养, 充足休息以增强抵抗力.

sentences.en: Prenatal: When your life was still somewhat your own.
sentences.cn: 产前: 你的生活还属于你自己的那段日子.

sentences.en: So population screening and prenatal diagnosis are very important measures.
sentences.cn: 所以,人群筛选和产前诊断是很重要的措施.

sentences.en: Some mothers take a prenatal vitamin supplement as a precaution.
sentences.cn: 某些母亲使用孕期维他命来预防营养不足.

sentences.en: The analysis of DNA methylation in plasma applicate to noninvasive prenatal diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 血浆DNA甲基化的分析进一步应用于无创性产前诊断具有可行性.

words.tran_cn: [妇产]产前的；胎儿期的；[医]出生以前的

phrases.tran_cn: 产前护理，产前保健；产前检查

trans.tran_en: relating to unborn babies and the care of  pregnant  women
